vulnerabilities.name: Sensitive Information in HTML Comment
vulnerabilities.description: HTML comment contains potentially sensitive information
vulnerabilities.evidence:
Section: Funfacts 
    <section class="layer-overlay overlay-theme-colored2-9 bg-no-repeat bg-pos-c...
vulnerabilities.remediation: Remove sensitive information from HTML comments

vulnerabilities.name: Missing Strict-Transport-Security Header
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add the Strict-Transport-Security header with appropriate values

vulnerabilities.name: Missing Content-Security-Policy Header
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement a Content Security Policy to prevent XSS attacks

vulnerabilities.name: Missing X-Content-Type-Options Header
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add the X-Content-Type-Options header with 'nosniff' value

vulnerabilities.name: Missing X-Frame-Options Header
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add the X-Frame-Options header to prevent clickjacking

vulnerabilities.name: Missing X-XSS-Protection Header
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add the X-XSS-Protection header to enable browser XSS protection

vulnerabilities.name: Version Information Disclosure
vulnerabilities.description: The server is disclosing version information through HTTP headers
vulnerabilities.remediation: Configure the server to not disclose version information
